items.sentence: I was driving behind you on the road this morning.
I don't know what time tomorrow's meeting will be.
When was the last time you checked your oil level?
When was the last time you had your tires rotated?
If Tom drops by, please give this document to him.
When funds are limited, priorities need to be set.
It has been three years since I came to live here.
That mountain is about three thousand meters high.
Tom stayed after school to talk with his teachers.
I think that Tom was the one who stole my bicycle.
I've already lost the pen that I bought yesterday.
Tom says that ketchup makes anything taste better.
Tom wrapped the package and tied it with a ribbon.
Tom did something without his parents' permission.
An ostrich can't fly any more than a kangaroo can.
You should see a doctor if the symptoms get worse.
Tom works as an engineer in the aviation industry.
You're not even listening to what I'm telling you.
As a teetotaler, Tom dislikes being around drunks.
When Mary was a girl, she was as cute as a button.
